meanings.definition: A person or thing that recognizes.
meanings.sent1: The recognizers in the crowd cheered when they saw their favorite singer.
meanings.sent2: The security guard was a skilled recognizer of faces.
meanings.sent3: The little dog was a great recognizer of his owner, wagging his tail happily whenever he saw her.
meanings.sent4: Her grandmother was a recognizer of old songs, always humming tunes from her youth.
meanings.sent5: The recognizer of emotions, she could always tell when someone was feeling sad.

meanings.definition: A software component that identifies patterns in data.
meanings.sent1: The recognizers in the program quickly identified the error in the code.
meanings.sent2: The AI system used recognizers to analyze the images and categorize them.
meanings.sent3: The recognizer in the software had a funny habit of finding faces in random shapes.
meanings.sent4: The algorithm acted as a recognizer, sorting through the data to find the relevant information.
meanings.sent5: The powerful recognizer sifted through the data, pinpointing the anomalies with precision.
